scripts.export: npm run build && php artisan export --urls=http://127.0.0.1:8000/ --urls=http://127.0.0.1:8000/contact --urls=http://127.0.0.1:8000/aboutme --urls=http://127.0.0.1:8000/archive --urls=http://127.0.0.1:8000/archive/web --urls=http://127.0.0.1:8000/archive/photo --urls=http://127.0.0.1:8000/archive/design && cp -r public/build dist/build && find dist -name '*.html' -type f -exec sed -i '' 's|http://localhost/build/|/build/|g' {} \; && find dist -name '*.html' -type f -exec sed -i '' 's|http://127.0.0.1:8000/build/|/build/|g' {} \; && find dist -name '*.html' -type f -exec sed -i '' 's|http://127.0.0.1:8000/|/|g' {} \;
